name: BoxCape (iXale)
description:
You are trapped in a Separate Dimension and you have to escape using to two different boxes. Use them Strategically to Reach the Portal. But look out for enemies you will immediately die if you came in contact with them. 

-Controls-

Yellow Box:   A-D & W to Move & Jump

Green Box :   Left - Right & Up Arrow Keys to Move & Jump

Credits:- iXale
